sn8.5:2.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagata vaca subhasita hoti, no dubbhasita; anavajja ca ananuvajja ca vinnunam.
sn8.5:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu subhasitamyeva bhasati no dubbhasitam, dhammamyeva bhasati no adhammam, piyamyeva bhasati no appiyam, saccamyeva bhasati no alikam.
sn8.5:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi angehi samannagata vaca subhasita hoti, no dubbhasita, anavajja ca ananuvajja ca vinnunan”ti.
sn8.5:2.6: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
sn8.5:4.1: Atha kho ayasma vangiso utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn8.5:4.4: Atha kho ayasma vangiso bhagavantam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthavi:
